title: Where/how do I report his out-of-game racism?
body:
[IMAGE REMOVED - NO NAMING AND SHAMING]

Riot apparently has a 0 tolerance policy when it comes to racism, this person added me after the game.

replies.body:
As others have already pointed out, the best option is to submit a ticket via [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), who will forward the case to the Player Behaviour team where it will be reviewed (may take several days for confirmation it has been picked up by PB). Because of the policies in-place at Riot, you will likely get a generic response and will not be informed of the result of the review.

I hope they get hit with something, though, as that behaviour is unacceptable.
Though I've very rarely seen any action taken on crap like this.  Riot just doesn't care.

There are obviously a lot of people who are of the opinion that Riot does nothing (or at least, nothing useful) when it comes to Player Behaviour issues (and other stuff as well, but talking about PB issues here). While I don't outright agree with that, I do think there is some truth to it, and that it often happens (or at least, seems as though) that the Player Behaviour team are not doing their job.

One thing to consider, though, is that Riot *definitely* wont do anything about toxic behaviours if they're not aware it's happening. At least by reporting it, you're making certain Riot are aware and if something isn't done, it's all on Riot, and complaints are more than fair.
